blog.name: marvelheroesassemble
blog.title: Marvel Your Universe
blog.description:
Will

Big huge and die hard Marvel fan.

Love all things Marvel and the MCU.

Love the Avengers.

Especially, the Original Six.

Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, the Hulk,

Black Widow and Hawkeye.

Robert Downey, Jr., Chris Evans,

Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo,

Scarlett Johansson and Jeremy Renner.

They’re my babies.

They hold a very special place in my heart.

All of them are legendary and iconic.

Love all the other heroes too.

Marvel is my Inspiration and my home!

"Avengers Assemble"

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: STITCH
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PxuzLT

by cozy_cinnamondrinks_and_starynights

Welcome to STITCH, SHIELD’s Training Institute for Teens with the capabilities of Heroes. The school’s mission is to “stitch” together teams of super-powered individuals, pulling from the children of heroes, children of villains, and children who have acquired powers in some other way.

Disguised as a normal school for Gifted teenagers, STITCH is a boarding school located on a small island in Florida’s Tampa Bay Area, in the Gulf of Mexico. This school is home to the children of Heroes (classified as Elect), children of villains (classified as Volatile), and children who have powers bestowed upon them in some other way (classified as Untried).

Students will be placed in groups of 3-4 students, consisting of at least one Elect, one Volatile, and one Untried student. The instructors will help these teams rise to greatness.

Words: 856, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of STITCH

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: Other
  • Characters: Lots of OCs, Stephen Strange, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Wanda Maximoff, Pietro Maximoff, James “Bucky” Barnes, Clint Barton, Bruce Banner, Loki (Marvel), Lorna Dane, Peter Parker, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Nick Fury, Raven | Mystique, Malekith (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Ymir (Marvel), Hela (Marvel), Crystallia Maximoff, Blackheart (Marvel), Honey Lemon (Marvel), Proteus, Super Skrull (Kl'rt), Wolverine, David Xavier, Bloodtide, Jessica Jones, Killgrave, Brunnhilde | Valkyrie (Marvel), Jane Foster (Marvel), Helen Cho, Galactus, Storm, Electro, Blackout, Angel Salvadore, Emma Frost, Pixie, Mirage, Selene (Marvel), Wind Dancer, Nightcrawler, Rogue, Daredevil, St John Allerdyce, Lady Deathstrike, Wolfsbane - Character, Odin (Marvel), Frigga | Freyja (Marvel), Dormammu (Marvel), Deadpool
  • Relationships: Multiple Pairings - Relationship, Don’t worry about them they won’t be seen much, Parents - Relationship
  • Additional Tags: in the future, new generation, let me have this, STITCH Operation, training new avengers, adopted kids, Children, Hydra, first fic, Wish me luck, some of the main characters are dead fam I’m sorry, some of these fuckers are gay, some are bi, some are lesbians, most of the characters listed won’t even be seen just referenced, I honestly just want to watch this backfire on SHIELD, SHIELD tryna control gen z again, these ocs will be from gen z damnit, with some being millenials, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Implied/Referenced Torture, Implied/Referenced Rape/Non-con, honestly these kids been through hell and want to feel safe damnit, I’m sorry but some of ya’ll characters will be dragged a bit, this is based of an long rp, haha - Freeform, Fluff and Humor, there will be happiness okay, these kids will be happy I promise, if you want to say it’s anti someone, it’s really anti everyone because hoo boi, no one is safe, Implied/Referenced Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism, Implied/Referenced Self-Harm, there’s a lot of things that will be implied, The Exclusives, The Author Regrets Nothing, Not Canon Compliant


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PxuzLT

reblog.comment:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PxuzLT

summary: Marveltober 12: Favourite Female Hero Ofc the woman behind the most successful company of earth would be here! Pepper is so so...
caption:
Marveltober 12: Favourite Female Hero

Ofc the woman behind the most successful company of earth would be here! Pepper is so so so strong and fierce, she’s brilliant, resilient, super smart and so sweet. Her bravery and courage really inspire me ♥️

blog.title: "I am... Iron Man"
blog.description:
Tony Stark is the Strongest Avenger| 
Header by @anthonyed

tags: peter said this to tony i can confirm
summary:
I get sex and all the craze around around it but sometimes,,, a bitch just wants to
loved for the sake of being loved, ya feel...
body:
I get sex and all the craze around around it but sometimes,,, a bitch just wants to

loved for the sake of being loved, ya feel me

Peter, awake past 11 pm strung on strong bean juice: Mr. Stark I know you want to cuddle Mr. Dr. strange so could you just like,,, be a thot,,, like the rest of us and text him please
